name: People Cu3ed
description: Join your cuboidal friends as you represent the 3rd dimension in the 'Interdimensional Games' - a VR game like no other - you'll find yourself leaving your boring human shape behind!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 980 / AMD Radeon R9 290 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1433 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel I5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1433 MB available space
